Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the practice of surge pricing by rideshare service companies
Summary: Prohibits the practice of surge pricing by rideshare service companies.
LawCode: Add ยง396-pp, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the practice of surge pricing by rideshare service companies
